argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nv0.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nv0.4 | |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) |
| 3 |  | nv0.6 | |- Z = ( 0vec ` U ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1st ` U ) = ( 1st ` U ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_nvvc | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> ( 1st ` U ) e. CVecOLD ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +v ` U ) = ( +v ` U ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_vafval | |- ( +v ` U ) = ( 1st ` ( 1st ` U ) ) |
| 8 | 2 | #P_smfval | |- S = ( 2nd ` ( 1st ` U ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 6 | #P_bafval | |- X = ran ( +v ` U ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( GId ` ( +v ` U ) ) = ( GId ` ( +v ` U ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 8, 9, 10 | #P_vc0 | |- ( ( ( 1st ` U ) e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( 0 S A ) = ( GId ` ( +v ` U ) ) ) |
| 12 | 5, 11 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( 0 S A ) = ( GId ` ( +v ` U ) ) ) |
| 13 | 6, 3 | #P_0vfval | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> Z = ( GId ` ( +v ` U ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> Z = ( GId ` ( +v ` U ) ) ) |
| 15 | 12, 14 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( 0 S A ) = Z ) |
